title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 47.4 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 47.4 - Applications

State Regulations

Applications for permission to make alterations shall be
filed on a form and in a manner as designated by the

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
47.4

Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
